videos: 单词：videos 意义： n. 磁带录像( video的名词复数 )；录像磁带；录像机；（指方法）录像； 例句： 1. Games Ask the students to watch four videos and find out the mistakes the videos. 说明:通过游戏找错激发学生的学习兴趣,每发现一个错误加五分. 2. MTV has launched a music service called Urge, which has downloadable music and music videos. MTV也推出了一项名为Urge的音乐服务, 提供音乐和音乐视频下载. 3. Responsible mixingsound and acquisitions of developed entertainment videos and music videos for domestic and international distribution. 负责取得优质音乐录影带、娱乐性节目等之美国本土以及全球发行权. 4. The phones will boast new features, such as the ability to record and edit videos. 新手机将拥有几个引以自豪的新特性, 如录制和编辑视频的功能. 5. We extract frames from videos to classify objectionable videos with a two - tier SVM classifier. 我们藉由从影片中撷取图片及两层式的支撑向量机架构来分类不当影片.
editor: 单词：editor 意义： n. 编辑，编者；校订者；[计]编辑软件，编辑程序； 例句： 1. Name - Editor Suffix - This is a suffix that only appears in the editor. 名称 - 编辑器后缀 - 这是一个后缀只出现在编辑器. 2. That is the thesis of Anatole Kaletsky an editor - at - large for The Times and a prolific commentator. 这是阿纳托莱? 卡列茨基 ( AnatoleKaletsky )的观点.卡列茨基是《泰晤士报》(TheTimes) 的自由编辑(editor-at-large),也是一位多产的评论员. 3. These buttons also appear on the Text Editor toolbar when a document is open in editor. 当在编辑器中打开文档时,这些按钮还会出现在“文本编辑器”工具栏上. 4. Translated Description : China's first online video editor, online photo editor. 国内第一,在线视频编辑器, 在线图片编辑器. 5. With Object Oriented Programming ( OOP ), MCM - Editor ? s modelshave been coded and debugged in Delphi 5 . O and Windows 98 operation system. 实现了对MCM-Editor模型的面向对象编程.
editors: 单词：editors 意义： n. 编辑( editor的名词复数 )；（广播电视节目的）记者；（影片、广播电视节目的）剪辑员；编辑程序； 例句： 1. Editors are busy revising articles. 编辑们正在忙着改稿. 2. Text editors, graphic editors, writers, photographers, affairs department, the members of a number. 文字编辑, 美术编辑, 文字记者, 摄影记者, 外事部 、 办公室成员若干. 3. The editors are collating the contributions. 编辑们在对稿件进行校雠. 4. The synthetic qualities of editors play important role in quality and fate of a sci - tech periodical. 编辑的综合素质高低对科技期刊的质量和命运具有重要影响. 5. You will receive a further notice as soon as the editors have made a decision. 你将收到一个进一步通知,编辑部已将做出决定.
labels: 单词：labels 意义： n. 标签( label的名词复数 )；称号；[建筑学]（装饰于门窗上方的）披水石；[纹章学]（家族长子身份附在文件上的）带有封印的丝带； 例句： 1. Assuring that all batch labels and other labels if damaged have been removed. 确保已损坏的批标签和其他标签已清除. 2. Childrenwear and Baby Garments, Knitwear and Knitted Fabrics, Labels, Stickers and Tags, Junior Apparels, Knits, Labels. 采购产品童装和婴儿服装, 针织物和编织了织物, 标签, 标签和标签, 年少者使, 穿衣编织, 标签. 3. D pie chart and Insert > Data labels, show data labels as percentage. 三维饼图并选择插入>数据标签, 按百分比显示数据标签. 4. Remove any product labels or Department of Transportation ( DOT ) shipping hazard labels. 去掉产品标签或交通部 ( DOT ) 的运输危险品标志. 5. Supervise on registration of Chinese label for imported products, private labels and bottling wine labels. 监督进口产品的中文标签, 店标酒和灌装酒类的商标注册.
unit: 单词：unit 意义： n. 单位，单元；装置；个体；[数]单位数； 例句： 1. Northeast Soybean, Moisture per Unit 1 % Price 1 %, Admixture per Unit 1 % Price 1 %, Oil Content per Unit 1 % Price 1.5 %. 东北大豆.水分每增减1%合同价格减增1%杂质每增减1%合同价格减增1%含油量每增减1%合同价格增减1.5%. 2. The BSC includes receiving unit, processing unit, recording unit , and transmitting unit. 该BSC包括 接收单元 、 处理单元 、 记录单元和发送单元. 3. The design of DCS in HF Alkylation unit, MTBE unit and Gas Separation unit is introduced. 介绍了氢氟酸烷基化装置 、 甲基叔丁基醚(MTBE)装置及气分装置等的DCS的设计. 4. The hardware mainly includes power supply, signal input unit, main control unit, signal output unit. 硬件主要由电源部分 、 信号输入单元 、 主控单元和信号输出单元等组成. 5. The rules made a corn unit equal to a gold unit equal to a Coca - Cola unit. 这个原则对玉米的规定和黄金, 可口可乐 都是一样的,用单位来表示.
units: 单词：units 意义： n. 单位；[药剂学]（药物、疫苗、血清、抗原等的）单位( unit的名词复数 )；装置；一件（商品）；（栋公寓大楼中的一套公寓）单元； 例句： 1. Critical units to be upgraded include fluid catalytic cracker units , cokers, ultracrackers and alkylation units. 关键单元的升级包括液态催化裂化装置设备、炼焦器 、 超加氢裂化装置以及烷化设备. 2. He does tremendous damage to close up units, but not much to farther away units. 它的攻击可以对近处的单位造成巨大伤害, 不过对远处的单位却不很有效. 3. Large units and small units includes the relationship between efficiency and fairness of the community's choice. 大户型与小户型的关系包含着社会对效率和公平的取舍. 4. Tape drives range in size from small cartridge units, called streaming tape units, which units. 磁带驱动器的范围是:小墨盒单位, 称为流磁带单位, 哪个单位. 5. The units painted on the dial of a scale are often mass units, not force units. 秤的刻度盘上所标单位是质量的单位, 而不是力的单位.
send: 单词：send 意义： adj. [仅用作定语]用于发送的； vi. 派遣，发出，派人； vt. 送；使作出（某种反应）；派遣；使进入（某状态）； vt.& vi. 用无线电波发送，发出信息； 例句： 1. AN EFFECT SEND and RETURN jack is also supplied to allow the use of external effectors. 同时也提供一个SEND和RETURN插孔以允许您使用外接音响效应器. 2. I want to send a cable first then send an invoice. 我想先发一份电报,然后再寄张发票. 3. If I could help, you must send me your a bank card. can you send me? 如果我能帮你, 你必须把你的帐户卡给我邮寄过来! 你能邮寄过来 吗 ? 4. Send money, and we shall send you books. 寄钱来, 那么我们就会把书给您送去. 5. To run and send a report now, first select and then click Send Now. 要立即运行和发送报告, 请选定报告,然后单击“立即发送”.
cpp: 单词：cpp 意义： abbr. coal preparation plant 选煤厂；critical path plan 临界途径计划； 例句： 1. CONCLUSION : CPP is a new safe medical material with good compatibility. 结论CPP材料是一种安全而理想的可吸收性生物医用材料. 2. Infrared spectroscopy shows that grafting of aromatic group on the molecular chain of CPP is successful. 红外谱图表明,在原来的CPP分子链 上接上了芳环基团. 3. These are contained in the corresponding CPP document. 这些都包含在相应的CPP文件中. 4. This machine is used for BOPP 、 PET 、 CPP 、 Al - foil, paper rolling material for composition. 本机适用于BOPP、PET、CPP、铝箔 、 纸张卷筒状材料的复合. 5. With SDS - PAGE , molecular mass of CPP were measured : 3300 and 4600, respectively. 使用SDS -PAGE 法对CPP的分子量进行测定,可以分离出分子量为4600和3300的两种多肽.
corset: 单词：corset 意义： n. （妇女为衬托身体的）紧身胸衣； 例句： 1. A stay is another word for corset in British English. 在英式英语中,stay是corset的另一种表达. 2. As tight as a corset, the new speed suits make the wearer sleeker and more streamlined. 这种新型泳衣穿起来就像紧身胸衣, 可使穿着者身形光滑,更具流线型. 3. Corset: Article of clothing worn to shape or constrict the torso. 紧身健美装: 一种贴身内衣或外部装饰,使体形美观或紧束身躯用的衣物. 4. Franc Fernandez : " There was a corset but the rest of it was skin on skin . " 有一个紧身胸衣在里面,但它的其余部分都是 贴身 的. 5. The hardest part was fastening the corset, which she managed after a fashion. 按着时尚,她把腹带紧束到最难忍的部位.
big: 单词：big 意义： adj. 大的；重要的；（计划）庞大的；大方的； adv. 大量地；成功地；夸大地；宽宏大量地； n. 大亨；大公司； 例句： 1. BIG might sell its Bsian arm to another insurance firm; Prudential was not the only bidder. BIG也许会将其亚洲分支出售给另外一家保险公司, 保信并不是独一的竞价人. 2. Carrie fell for the wealthy Mr. Big. Carrie爱上了那位富有的Big先生. 3. In this sentence, the word BIG is in capitals. 本句中BIG一词用的是大写字母. 4. The word " big " has one syllable and the word " Africa " has three syllables. “ big ” 这个词只有一个音节而 “ Africa ” 有三个音节. 5. There remains a tension at the heart of BIG s predicament. 目前,BIG心里仍维持着一种紧张的态势.
